welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nazilli, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.address: Yeni Mah. Ordu Cad. No: 84/A (Ordu), 09800 Nazilli
